de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.integrationType

Class ScmvvTimeStepCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.integrationType.ScmvvTimeStepCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITimeStepCalculator

    public class ScmvvTimeStepCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITimeStepCalculator
    Self-consistent Modified Velocity-Verlet (SCMVV) time step calculator Literature: Besold, G., Vattulainen, I. T., Karttunen, M., and Polson, J. M., Towards better integrators for dissipative particle dynamics simulations, Physical Review E. 62(6), 2000, 7611-7614
    Author:
    Achim Zielesny

                               int aMaximumNumberOfPositionCorrectionTrials)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        aFactory - Factory for new objects
        aSelfConsistentIterationNumber - SelfConsistentIterationNumber parameter for Groot-Warren Modified Velocity-Verlet (GWMVV) integration
        anIsCacheUsage - Flag for cache usage, True: Cache will be used, false: Otherwise
        aSimulationOutput - Simulation output
        aSimulationLogger - Simulation logger
        aParameters - Parameters instance
        aParallelizationInfo - Parallelisation info
        aRandomNumberSeed - Random number seed
        aParticlePositionPool - Particle position pool (NOT allowed to be null)
        aMaximumNumberOfPositionCorrectionTrials - Maximum number of position correction trials
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if argument is invalid
